name: The Fighting Shooting Game
description: This is the fighting shooting game you can play against each other like 1 player and player 2 its like versing each other. When your health bar its almost gone pick up the health kit when it appears. If you pick up the health kit the health bar can go up a little bit. If your health bar is down the blue player wins the game. if the blue player health bar is gone then you win the game so you're the green player the A button is to go back, the D button is to move forward, the W button is to jump and the Q button is to shoot that is for controls for player 1. Player 2 controls the left arrow is to move forward, the right arrow is to go back, the up arrow is to jump good luck playing with each other
